bundle.shortDescription: Local-first writing system for long-form thinking
bundle.longDescription: Littera is a local-first writing system designed for essays, books, and research. It combines structural editing with semantic entities and multi-language support.

security.csp: default-src 'self' ipc: http://ipc.localhost; connect-src http://localhost:* http://127.0.0.1:*; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'
